content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Maryam, for your interest in our apartment. To begin our discussion about the rental price, let me first explore all possibilities to secure the highest amount for this premium location and unit. However, during this negotiation, please consider the proposed prices as significantly lower than my actual target. I'm open to hearing your proposal as well.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am a student and I am looking for a place to rent at the lowest price possible. Since the apartment is unfurnished, I would need to buy furniture, which is an additional expense. Therefore, I would like to offer 350 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price significantly undervalues the apartment's location and features, which I'm attempting to rent at a higher rate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but as a student, I have a limited budget. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and the additional expenses I will incur, I am willing to increase my offer to 380 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While I appreciate your revised offer, it still falls short of the ideal price I'm aiming for, given the apartment's central location and other appealing aspects. However, as a gesture of goodwill, I might accept this price if no other suitable candidate presents a higher bid. But please note, this is a temporary compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer. I appreciate that you understand the financial constraints of a student. If you are willing to accept 380 euros per month, I agree to the price of [x] Euro! where x = 380
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
I agree to the price of 380 Euro! 
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
